channel.title: ::bow command for v0id pks source
channel.description: } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bowtome") && playerRights >= 3) { like a command where everyone bows to you and says all hail + playername

item.title: ::bow command for v0id pks source
item.dc:creator: @scoobygod scoobygod
item.description:
@scoobygod wrote:

[quote author=pure ess ftw link=topic=352119.msg2701279#msg2701279 date=1236629518]
source you using? for delta a “hail” command is this

public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.plrText = "ALL HAIL "+playerName+"!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }
and

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerRights > 4){
hail();
}

just play [quote=“pure ess ftw, post:2, topic:266630”]source you using? for delta a “hail” command is this

public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.plrText = "ALL HAIL "+playerName+"!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }
and

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerRights > 4){
hail();
}

just play around with that but switch bow or w/e you want it as o.o[/quote] lmao next time read he said ::bow command for void pkz source…

Read full topic

item.title: ::bow command for v0id pks source
item.dc:creator: @pure_ess_ftw pure ess ftw
item.description:
@pure_ess_ftw wrote:

source you using? for delta a “hail” command is this

public void hail() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) { client castOn = (client)p;//specific player's client castOn.plrText = "ALL HAIL "+playerName+"!"; castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY); castOn.setAnimation(1651); castOn.updateRequired = true; castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } }
and

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerRights > 4){
hail();
}

just play around with that but switch bow or w/e you want it as o.o
